snippet.title: Blaze and Blade: Eternal Quest [PC - gameplay]
snippet.description:
Blaze and Blade: Eternal Quest is a multiplayer action roleplaying game developed by T&E Soft for the PlayStation and PC. B&B has been heavily criticized (especially the Windows version) for its lack of main hero or story, blurry graphics and a sloppy PC conversion. However it had several unique elements like a complete character creation or 2-4 player simultaneous multiplayer. 

I personally think it's a fun little game, especially if you have someone to play with
